Emerging growth company&#160;&#160; &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&#160;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&#160;&#160;&#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; ITEM&#160;8.01 Other Events. On January&#160;7, 2024, Berkshire Hathaway issued a press release to announce that it had reached an agreement to fully settle the Delaware litigation, including all claims and counterclaims, between Pilot Corporation and Berkshire Hathaway Inc., Pilot Travel Centers LLC, and National Indemnity Company. A copy of this press release is furnished with this report as an exhibit to this Form&#160;8-K. &#160; ITEM&#160;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits &#160; Exhibit&#160;99.1 &#160;&#160; Berkshire Hathaway Inc. Press Release Dated January&#160;7, 2024 Exhibit&#160;104 &#160;&#160; Cover Page Interactive Data File (embedded within the Inline XBRL document).
